data_table.description: The subject phenotype data table includes sociodemography (n=2 variables; sex and race), medical history (n=3 variables; menarche, family history of stroke, and gout), baseline observations (n=26 variables; anthropometric measures, MI, Framingham risk score, type 2 diabetes, lipids and cholesterol measures, hypertension status, stroke, angioplasty, atrial fibrillation, and PAD), follow-up observations (n=7 variables; MI, stroke, atrial fibrillation), EKG measures (n=11 variables), lung function measures (n=5 variables), heart measurements (n=7 variables; CABG, CAC agatston score, IMT), bone mineral density measures (n=4 variables), urine analysis (n=6 variables), serum proteins (n=12 variables; CRP, IL-6, ICAM-1, p-selectin, cystatin-c, and creatinine), blood coagulation factors (n=6 variables; fibrinogen, Factor VII, and VWF), blood count (n=10 variables; WBC, hemoglobin, hematocrit, MCV, and RBC), and smoking status (n=2 variables).

variable.name: SUBJID
variable.description: Subject ID

variable.name: ESP_Cohort
variable.description: Cohort name

variable.name: ESP_phenotype
variable.description: ESP Phenotype group (phenotype that the sample was selected to be sequenced for)

variable.name: Sequence_center
variable.description: Indicates where the sample was sequence at

variable.name: Target
variable.description: Indicates target capture used in sequencing

variable.name: ESP_race_selfreport
variable.description: Self report race

variable.name: ESP_sex_selfreport
variable.description: Values: Male; Female

variable.name: ESP_study_site_or_subcohort
variable.description: Sub-cohort within FHS

variable.name: ESP_age_baseline
variable.description: Age in years at baseline

variable.name: ESP_mi_baseline
variable.description: MI status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_mi_during_followup
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that an MI occurred during study follow up. 0 if no MI during study follow up. 1 if an adjudicated MI occurred during study follow up (even if baseline MI status was 1).

variable.name: ESP_mi_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to event variable for MI. Time (in days) from start of study to MI for event that occurred during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not have an MI during study follow up.

variable.name: ESP_age_qualifying_mi
variable.description: Needed for a few FHS EOMI cases where confirmed early onset MI occurred before entering study. The remaining EOMI cases were incident and use of age at baseline and mi_tte_or_censor will provide age at MI for those cases

variable.name: ESP_frs_chdprob_baseline
variable.description: Framingham Risk Score predicted prob. calculated at baseline (was not calculated for those with baseline history of MI)

variable.name: ESP_bmi_baseline
variable.description: Baseline BMI in kg/m2

variable.name: ESP_t2diabetes_baseline
variable.description: Diabetes status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_weight_baseline
variable.description: Weight in kg. at baseline

variable.name: ESP_waist_baseline
variable.description: Waist in cm at baseline

variable.name: ESP_whr_baseline
variable.description: Waist to hip ratio at baseline

variable.name: ESP_height_baseline
variable.description: Standing height in cm at baseline

variable.name: ESP_ldl_baseline
variable.description: Baseline calculated LDL in mg/dL (missing where trigs>400)

variable.name: ESP_hdl_baseline
variable.description: HDL level in mg/dL at baseline

variable.name: ESP_trigs_baseline
variable.description: Triglycerides at baseline in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_totchol_baseline
variable.description: Total cholesterol at baseline in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_lipid_med_baseline
variable.description: Any lipid lowering med (statin or other) at baseline

variable.name: ESP_sbp_baseline
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure at baseline (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: ESP_dbp_baseline
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure at baseline (avg. of 2 measurements), in mm Hg

variable.name: ESP_htn_status_baseline
variable.description: Physician diagnosed hypertension status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_htn_med_baseline
variable.description: Hypertension med status (any) at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_stroke_baseline
variable.description: Stroke status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_stroke_during_followup
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that a stroke occurred during study follow up. 0 if no stroke during study follow up. 1 if an adjudicated stroke occurred during study follow up (even if baseline stroke status was 1).

variable.name: ESP_stroke_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to event variable for stroke. Time (in days) from start of study to stroke for event that occurred during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not have an stroke during study follow up.

variable.name: ESP_inc_stroke_subtype
variable.description: Incident stroke subtype. Subtype is available only on a subset of samples, so will be missing for some with non-missing age at incident stroke

variable.name: ESP_stroke_famhx_baseline
variable.description: Family history (first degree relatives) of stroke at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_current_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Current smoking status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_former_smoker_baseline
variable.description: Former smoking status at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_menarche
variable.description: Age in years at menarche

variable.name: ESP_afib_baseline
variable.description: Atrial fibrillation at baseline (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_afib_during_followup
variable.description: 0/1 to indicate that an afib occurred during study follow up. 0 if no afib during study follow up. 1 if an adjudicated afib occurred during study follow up.

variable.name: ESP_afib_tte_or_censor
variable.description: Time to event variable for afib. Time (in days) from start of study to afib for event that occurred during study follow up; and follow up time for those that did not have an afib during study follow up.

variable.name: ESP_fibrinogen
variable.description: Fibrinogen level in mg/dL at first designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_fibrinogen
variable.description: Age in years at Fibrinogen measurement

variable.name: ESP_factorvii
variable.description: Factor VII level in % at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_factorvii
variable.description: Age in years at Factor VII measurement

variable.name: ESP_vwf
variable.description: VWF level in % at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_vwf
variable.description: Age in years at visit of hemostatic factors measurement

variable.name: ESP_crp
variable.description: C-reactive protein level in mg/L at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_crp
variable.description: Age in years at CRP measurement

variable.name: ESP_il6
variable.description: IL6 level in pg/mL at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_il6
variable.description: Age in years at IL6 measurement

variable.name: ESP_icam1
variable.description: ICAM1 level in ng/mL at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_icam1
variable.description: Age in years at ICAM1 measurement

variable.name: ESP_pselectin
variable.description: P-selectin level at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_pselectin
variable.description: Age in years at P-selectin measurement

variable.name: ESP_wbc
variable.description: White blood count in x1,000/cubic mm at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_wbc
variable.description: Age in years at WBC measurement

variable.name: ESP_hemoglobin
variable.description: Hemoglobin at designated visit (may not be baseline) in g/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_hemoglobin
variable.description: Age in years at hemoglobin measurement

variable.name: ESP_hematocrit
variable.description: Hematocrit at designated visit (may not be baseline) in %

variable.name: ESP_age_at_hematocrit
variable.description: Age in years at hematocrit measurement

variable.name: ESP_mean_corpuscular_volume
variable.description: Mean corpuscular volume in femtoliters at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_mcv
variable.description: Age in years at mean corpuscular volume measurement

variable.name: ESP_red_blood_count
variable.description: Red blood cell count in million cells per microliter at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_rbc
variable.description: Age in years at red blood cell count measurement

variable.name: ESP_cac_agatston_score
variable.description: Coronary artery calcium Agatston total score

variable.name: ESP_age_at_cac
variable.description: Age in years at CAC Agatston score measurement

variable.name: ESP_imt_meanmean_farwall_cca
variable.description: Average far wall thickness of the right and left common carotid mean IMT values, using as many views as are available for a given study

variable.name: ESP_imt_meanmean_farwall_ica
variable.description: Average far wall thickness of the right and left internal carotid maximum IMT values, using as many views as are available for a given study

variable.name: ESP_imt_anyplaque
variable.description: Presence of any plaque, as determined by IMT at designated visit (may not be baseline).

variable.name: ESP_age_at_imt
variable.description: Age in years at IMT measurement

variable.name: ESP_angioplasty_baseline
variable.description: BASELINE ANGIOPLASTY STATUS (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_cabg_baseline
variable.description: BASELINE CABG STATUS (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_pad
variable.description: BASELINE PERIPHERAL ARTERY DISEASE STATUS (0/1)

variable.name: ESP_ABI_resids_from_CARe
variable.description: Residuals for ankle brachial index (ABI), calculated in CARe

variable.name: ESP_age_at_ABI
variable.description: Age in years at ABI measurement

variable.name: ESP_ekg_qrs
variable.description: QRS interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_ekg_rr
variable.description: RR interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_ekg_qt
variable.description: QT interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_ekg_pr
variable.description: PR interval from EKG at designated visit (may not be baseline)

variable.name: ESP_aflut_at_ekg
variable.description: ATRIAL FLUTTER AT EKG

variable.name: ESP_wpw_at_ekg
variable.description: WOLFF-PARKINSON-WHITE PATTERN

variable.name: ESP_avblock2_at_ekg
variable.description: SECOND DEGREE AV BLOCK

variable.name: ESP_avblock3_at_ekg
variable.description: THIRD DEGREE AV BLOCK

variable.name: ESP_pacer_ekg
variable.description: PACER AT EKG

variable.name: ESP_digoxin_ekg
variable.description: Digoxin, for EKG group

variable.name: ESP_age_at_ekg
variable.description: Age in years at EKG measurement

variable.name: ESP_uric_acid
variable.description: Uric acid in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_uric_acid
variable.description: Age in years at uric acid measurement

variable.name: ESP_urinary_albumin
variable.description: Raw urinary albumin. Note: these are in original study units and not harmonized across studies)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_urinary_albumin
variable.description: Age in years at urinary albumin measurement

variable.name: ESP_urinary_creatinine
variable.description: Raw urinary creatinine in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_urinary_creatinine
variable.description: Age in years at urinary creatinine measurement

variable.name: ESP_serum_cystatinc
variable.description: Raw cystatin C (mg/L)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_serum_cystatinc
variable.description: Age in years at serum cystatin c measurement

variable.name: ESP_serum_creatinine
variable.description: Serum creatinine in mg/dL

variable.name: ESP_age_at_serum_creatinine
variable.description: Age at serum creatinine measurement

variable.name: ESP_gout
variable.description: May be MD-reported, self-reported, or abstracted from patients taking allopurinol. Ever had gout through study.

variable.name: ESP_fev1_first_avail_visit
variable.description: FEV1 measurement at the first available visit (only for HeartGO)

variable.name: ESP_fvc_first_avail_visit
variable.description: FVC measurement at the first available visit (only for HeartGO)

variable.name: ESP_lung_function_visit
variable.description: The visit that lung function measurements were taken

variable.name: ESP_hip_bmd
variable.description: Bone mineral density for hip (DEXA)

variable.name: ESP_spine_bmd
variable.description: Bone mineral density for spine (DEXA)

variable.name: ESP_age_at_bmd
variable.description: Age at DEXA visit

variable.name: ESP_fhs_meno_at_bmd
variable.description: Menopause status at DEXA visit (only for FHS)
